WorkItem.ClosedComment: ShowMessage now return MessageBoxResult (addressed in changeset 101528)
WorkItem.Description: It seems to be impossible to know whether user pressed "cancel" or "no" button. Both buttons return the same result "false", but I need to differ my logic depending on the pressed button.

Comments.Message:
You sir, raise a valid point. I'm thinking about changing the return type to [MessageBoxResult](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.windows.messageboxresult.aspx). This does break the API.

Thoughts?
